title: Lead reserves worldwide by country 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Reserves in million metric tons in the y axis.
The Reserves in million metric tons is highest at Country Australia and lowest at Country Other countries.
The difference of Reserves in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 36.0.
